#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
long long int max(long long int a,long long int b)
{
	if(a>b)
	return a;
	else
	return b;
}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	long long int t,a,b;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
		if(b==a+1)
		printf("%lld\n",a&b);
		else
		printf("%lld\n",max((b&(b-1)),(b-1)&(b-2)));
	}
}
